nodes.text: TB-31 was the designation of a stormtrooper that served the Galactic Empire.

In 0 ABY, TB-31 was among those sent to retrieve a captured Princess Leia Organa on the planet Delaya. Upon the orders of his officer, TB-31 and his squad opened fire and killed J'er Nahj and Halle Dray, the Alderaanians who originally captured Organa. TB-31 and TB-2954 were then ordered to take Organa into their temporary base for interrogation.
